title: Presidents want SC justice with similar views

content.question: A major reason why the majority of Supreme Court justices have had political experience prior to appointment to the Court is that

choices.label: justices are expected to act like politicians in their decision-making
Presidents seek to place individuals on the Court whose policy views are similar to their own
the Senate will refuse to confirm any nominee to the Court who is not familiar with the political process
appointment to the Supreme Court is a reward for political party loyalty
the Court is expected to defer to the political branches in making its decisions

content.answer: Presidents seek to place individuals on the Court whose policy views are similar to their own

topic.text: 2.9: The Role of the Judicial Branch

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
